```{r}
StuDF <- data.frame(
  StuID=c(1,2,3,4,5),
  name=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  score=c(80,60,90,70,50)
  )
StuDF[1,2 ]
StuDF[1,]
StuDF[c(1,4),]
StuDF[c(1,4),c(2,3)]
```

```{r}
StuDF[c(1, 2, 3),]
StuDF[c(1:3,5),]
c(1:3) # same as c(1,2,3)
c(5:7) # same as c(5,6,7)
c(1,5:7,10) #same as c(1,5,6,7,10)
```

```{r}
StuDF[c(T,F,F,F,F),c(F,T,F)]
StuDF[c(T,F,F,T,F),]
```

```{r}
as.character(StuDF$name) -> StuDF$name
```

```{r}
StuDF[c(1,4),]
StuDF[-c(1,4),]
```
